adjectives.description: scotchy (comparative more scotchy, superlative most scotchy)

entries.meaning: Resembling or characteristic of Scotch whisky.
examples: Because he was expected to drive to The Nutcracker, Gary couldn’t do as much drinking as he might have wished before dinner.  […]  [H]e laid his scotchy head on the cold pillow and turned out the light in his old St. Judean bedroom  […]
